forumNotes.author: copain
forumNotes.content:
Can anyone please help me regarding the matter of usb booting of Ubuntu ultimate edition.  
I have a storejet 320 gb usb hdd. I want to boot a full ubuntu ultimate edition 2.5 from it.  
Is it possible to boot ultimate edition from usb hdd?  
It will be great if you help me.  
Thanks in advance
